title: The Miners of Melbourne
creator_credit: Melbourne and Metropolitan Board of Works and Cine Service
brief_description: Deals with the construction of various types of tunnel for Melbourne’s sewerage and water supply systems. Includes the operation of the mechanical boring machine, the “mole”, used on construction of the South-Eastern Trunk Sewer and on the Thomson scheme.
creator_credit_for_label: Melbourne and Metropolitan Board of Works and Cine Service
